name: Get Off My Planet (itch)
description:
Made in Unity for #1GAM (February 2016)

You're an alien living by yourself in your own planet. Suddenly, a fleet of weird flying objects from planet Earth attempt to claim it for their own! Your mission is to defend your planet from the earthling invaders.

For better performance, we suggest to download and play the Windows version.

Controls:
WSAD: move
Mouse: point & shoot
1-3: switch weapon (when unlocked)
Esc: pause

Authors:
Pedro Pereira (@pmhpereira)
Pedro Lucas (@ordepsacul)
